ns5:service-version.name: Apache
ns5:service-version.description: Apache 2.2 The Apache HTTP Server is an open-source HTTP server for modern operating systems including UNIX, Microsoft Windows, Mac OS/X and Netware. The goal of this project is to provide a secure, efficient and extensible server that provides HTTP services observing the current HTTP standards. Apache has been the most popular web server on the Internet since April of 1996.

ns6:component-version-script.description: Configure repo and install Apache server
ns6:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Tested on CentOS if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then # SELinux can be disabled by setting "/usr/sbin/setenforce Permissive" echo 'SELinux in enabled on this VM template. This service requires SELinux to be disabled to install successfully' exit 1 fi
yum --nogpgcheck -y clean all yum --nogpgcheck -y install httpd
# Ports on which to listen sed -ie "s/^Listen .*/Listen $http_port\nListen $http_proxy_port/g" /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf
# set up auto-start on booting chkconfig httpd on

#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
if [ ! "$http_port" == "" ]; then echo "Adding static site configuration on port $http_port"
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF
<VirtualHost *:$http_port> DocumentRoot /var/www/html ServerName localhost </VirtualHost>
EOF
# Copy the default index page into place cp /var/www/error/noindex.html /var/www/html/index.html fi
if [ ! "$http_node_ips" == "None" ]; then SUBSTR=""
if [ "$use_ajp" == "YES" ]; then for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember ajp://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port} route=${jvm_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer ajp config: "$SUBSTR
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF LoadModule proxy_ajp_module modules/mod_proxy_ajp.so <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass /$ajp_proxy_context balancer://mycluster/$tomcat_context </VirtualHost>
EOF else for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember http://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port} route=${jvm_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer config: "$SUBSTR
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass / balancer://mycluster/ stickysession=JSESSIONID|jsessionid nofailover=On ProxyPassReverse / balancer://mycluster/ ProxyPreserveHost On </VirtualHost>
EOF fi
else echo "Proxy load balancer disabled" fi

ns6:component-version-script.script:
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin
ADAPTER_VERSION=1.0 APP_NAME=subversion APP_VERSION=1.7.5-0
if [ -x /usr/sbin/setenforce ]; then /usr/sbin/setenforce 0 fi
echo "Installing BitNami common packages.." yum --nogpgcheck -y clean all yum --nogpgcheck -y install subversion mod_dav_svn
echo "Downloading BitNami packages.." platform=`uname -m`
cd /tmp
if [ $platform == "i686" ]; then echo "32 bit" wget ${download_url}/bitnami-$APP_NAME-$APP_VERSION-module-linux-installer.run else echo "64 bit" wget ${download_url}/bitnami-$APP_NAME-$APP_VERSION-module-linux-x64-installer.run fi
echo "Installing BitNami packages.." chmod 755 bitnami-* ./bitnami-subversion* --mode unattended --prefix /opt/bitnami --subversion_repository_path ${subversion_repository_path} --subversion_port ${subversion_port} rm bitnami-subversion* echo "OK!"
mv /etc/httpd/conf.d/welcome.conf /etc/httpd/conf.d/welcome.conf.bak mv /var/www/html /var/www/html.orig ln -s /opt/bitnami/apache2/htdocs /var/www/html
echo "OK!"

ns6:component-version-script.description: Configure repo and install Apache server
ns6:component-version-script.script:
#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
# Tested on CentOS if [ -x /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled ] && /usr/sbin/selinuxenabled; then # SELinux can be disabled by setting "/usr/sbin/setenforce Permissive" echo 'SELinux in enabled on this VM template. This service requires SELinux to be disabled to install successfully' exit 1 fi
yum --nogpgcheck -y clean all yum --nogpgcheck -y install httpd
# Ports on which to listen sed -ie "s/^Listen .*/Listen $http_port\nListen $http_proxy_port/g" /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf
# set up auto-start on booting chkconfig httpd on

#!/bin/bash # Import global conf . $global_conf
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin set -e
if [ ! "$http_port" == "" ]; then echo "Adding static site configuration on port $http_port"
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF
<VirtualHost *:$http_port> DocumentRoot /var/www/html ServerName localhost </VirtualHost>
EOF
# Copy the default index page into place cp /var/www/error/noindex.html /var/www/html/index.html fi
if [ ! "$http_node_ips" == "None" ]; then SUBSTR=""
if [ "$use_ajp" == "YES" ]; then for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember ajp://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port} route=${jvm_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer ajp config: "$SUBSTR
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF LoadModule proxy_ajp_module modules/mod_proxy_ajp.so <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass /$ajp_proxy_context balancer://mycluster/$tomcat_context </VirtualHost>
EOF else for (( i = 0 ; i < ${#http_node_ips[@]} ; i++ )); do SUBSTR="$SUBSTR"$'\n'"BalancerMember http://${http_node_ips[$i]}:${http_node_port} route=${jvm_routes[$i]}" done echo "Proxy load balancer config: "$SUBSTR
cat >> /etc/httpd/conf/httpd.conf << EOF <VirtualHost *:$http_proxy_port> <Proxy balancer://mycluster> $SUBSTR </Proxy> ProxyPass / balancer://mycluster/ stickysession=JSESSIONID|jsessionid nofailover=On ProxyPassReverse / balancer://mycluster/ ProxyPreserveHost On </VirtualHost>
EOF fi
else echo "Proxy load balancer disabled" fi

#!/bin/bash export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin
echo "Change machine password for development.." echo "bitnami" > /tmp/passwd echo "bitnami" >> /tmp/passwd head -2 /tmp/passwd | passwd
